text: Oristano (Aristànis) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Oristano in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 31,687 people lived there. Its area is 84.57 km². It is 9 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Oristano Category:Capital cities in Italy
title: Oristano
